Articles.Content: Hello. I just downloaded the mod Kerbal Konstructs (and Kerbin Side). I messed around with it, built a few launch complexes and launched from them. But my only question is: is there a way to make custom buildings IN GAME. Like walls, windows or other things. I didn’t find anything on the forums or online so can anyone help me?

1

Edited February 4, 2019 by Tig

On 1/30/2019 at 11:18 PM, Tig said:

I know that saying "hey, make your own 3d models!" is probably not the answer you wanted to hear. 

I got blender a while back. I don’t have unity though So is there a way to make the collision mesh in blender or would I half to get unity?

19 minutes ago, MSA said:

I don’t have unity though So is there a way to make the collision mesh in blender

You could make a collision mesh in blender, but for best results the model needs to go through unity.  Also  re  modular building assets,  ie , wall doors windows etc,  I've tried it and even on a simple scale neither KK or KSP like it very much, the problem is that you end up with hundreds of individual collision boxes, each one  requiring the same management as a fully complete 1 part building,  all of which results in much more lag than the average player would be happy with
 

Spoiler
